content: i designed shifter to give you a perfect first-time-knitting-color-work-socks project they feature simple 8 stitch repeats a plain foot/toe and a striped gusset the pattern includes detailed instructions and directions for making a functional coffee cozy swatch whether you are new to knitting socks or a seasoned pro this fun project is a special galentine s gift from jac and megan-anne at lattes & llamas 1 i hope you enjoy them as much as i did **want another simple sock to start your sock knitting obsession with check out the revivify socks 2 the perfect companion to shifter ** 1 https //lattesandllamas com/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/revivify-socks
